com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser

Class ServerQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser.ServerQuery

  • public class ServerQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Queries a single Chivalry: Medieval Warfare server for its information, game rules, or players.
